sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Luminopsins integrate opto- and chemogenetics by using physical and biological light sources for opsin activation. Berglund K, Clissold K, Li HE, Wen L, Park SY, Gleixner J, Klein ME, Lu D, Barter JW, Rossi MA, Augustine GJ, Yin HH, Hochgeschwender U. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2016 Jan 19;113(3):E358-67. doi: 10.1073/pnas.1510899113. Epub 2016 Jan 5. 10.1073/pnas.1510899113 PubMed 26733686

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pcDNA3.1-CAG-NanoLuc-VChR1-EYFP was a gift from Ute Hochgeschwender (Addgene plasmid # 114112 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:114112 ; RRID:Addgene_114112)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
